name: Hell-evator
description:
Play as an IADE student trying to get to the last floor on the out-of-service elevator.

Game developed in IADE during a cross class gamejam between the Games and Apps Development and Design courses.

It took us around 24h during the gamejam and an extra 8h dedicated to bugfixing and finishing the levels (6th,  7th and finish screen) to complete the game.

---------- Play on the Web or Download for free ----------

----------------------------------------------------------------------

DEVELOPERS

Programmer:

  • Filipe Ribeiro

Artists:

  • Samuel Correia
  • Eva Sequeira
  • António Miguel

----------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

Left and right arrows / AD   --->   Movement

Spacebar / Up arrow  --->   Jump

F   --->   Attack

E   --->   Pickup buttons

----------------------------------------------------------------------

CHEATS

"N" ---> Next level

"M" ---> Previous level
